data.name: AWARD_OPTIONS_DESCRIPTION_GE
data.value: Light German tank with a relatively powerful and accurate gun. Frontal armor is rather sturdy and can endure quite a few hits.

data.name: AWARD_OPTIONS_DESCRIPTION_US
data.value: Medium U.S. tank with a wide variety of guns, high dynamics, but weak armor. Excellent for active reconnaissance and supporting an attack.

data.name: AWARD_OPTIONS_DESCRIPTION_USSR
data.value: Light U.S.S.R. tank with average speed and weak armor. Its powerful gun and great dynamics enable effective medium-range performance.

data.name: BATTLE_RESULT_DESCRIPTION_ASSISTED
data.value: Damage upon your spotting and upon your destroying a track is counted.

data.name: BATTLE_RESULT_DESCRIPTION_BLOCKED
data.value: Total damage blocked by the armor of your vehicle including hits on external modules, non-penetrating hits, and ricochets.

data.name: BATTLE_RESULT_DESCRIPTION_DAMAGE
data.value: Total damage caused to enemy vehicles.

data.name: BATTLE_RESULT_DESCRIPTION_DESTROYED
data.value: Number of enemy vehicles destroyed by you.

data.name: BATTLE_RESULT_DESCRIPTION_DETECTED
data.value: Number of enemy vehicles spotted by you.

data.name: HINT_ADVANCED_SNIPER_BEFORE
data.value: The Sniper mode provides for better aiming at the weak spots of enemy vehicles

data.name: HINT_ADVANCED_SNIPER_MAIN
data.value: A green marker indicates a high chance of causing damage

data.name: HINT_ALLY_SHOOT
data.value: Do not fire at your allies!

data.name: HINT_CAMERA_CONTROLS
data.value: Inspect your vehicle by clicking and holding LMB

data.name: HINT_EXIT_GAME_AREA
data.value: You are leaving the battlefield. Get back!

data.name: HINT_HEAL_CREW
data.value: Gunner injured, accuracy reduced. Use the First Aid Kit

data.name: HINT_MESSAGE_AVOID
data.value: Flank and destroy the enemy vehicle; try to avoid being hit

data.name: HINT_MISSION3_CAPTUREBASE
data.value: Capturing an enemy base is one of the ways to secure victory

data.name: HINT_MISSION3_CAPTUREHELP
data.value: Get back and help your ally capture the base

data.name: HINT_MISSION3_CAPTURELOST
data.value: When you take damage, your capture progress is reset

data.name: HINT_MISSION3_CAPTURETOGETHER
data.value: Several vehicles capture the base faster

data.name: HINT_MISSION3_FALLBACK
data.value: There are too many of them! Fall back!

data.name: HINT_MISSION3_FLANKINGFAILS
data.value: You have been spotted! Remember: firing reveals your position

data.name: HINT_MISSION3_FLANKINGWAIT
data.value: They are leaving! Stay alert and watch the area

data.name: HINT_MISSION3_FOLIAGEINTROA
data.value: Hold your fire; otherwise, the enemy will spot you

data.name: HINT_MISSION3_FOLIAGEINTROB
data.value: Bushes will hide you from enemies as long as you hold your fire

data.name: HINT_MISSION3_PLAYERDETECTED
data.value: You have been spotted! Get ready to fight

data.name: HINT_REPAIR_TRACK
data.value: Track destroyed. Use the Repair Kit

data.name: HINT_SECONDARY_SNIPER
data.value: Scroll the mouse wheel to enter the Sniper mode

data.name: HINT_SHOOT
data.value: Aim at an enemy vehicle and fire

data.name: HINT_SNIPER
data.value: Scroll the mouse wheel to enter Sniper mode

data.name: HINT_SNIPER_ON_DISTANCE_EXIT
data.value: Scroll the mouse wheel to leave Sniper mode

data.name: HINT_SNIPER_ON_DISTANCE_MAIN
data.value: Scroll the mouse wheel to enter Sniper mode

data.name: HINT_TARGET_UNLOCK
data.value: Auto-aim enabled. Disable it with RMB

data.name: HINT_USE_EXTINGUISHER
data.value: Vehicle on fire! Use the Fire Extinguisher

data.name: LOADING_TIP_MODULES_HEADER_1
data.value: Damaging external modules does not cause damage to the vehicle

data.name: MESSAGE_CONSUMABLES_TEXT
data.value: Used to repair damaged modules and treat injured crew members

data.name: MESSAGE_CREDITS_TEXT
data.value: Used to purchase vehicles and equipment

data.name: MESSAGE_EQUIPMENT_TEXT
data.value: Improves particular characteristics of a vehicle

data.name: MESSAGE_EXPERIENCE_TEXT
data.value: Used to research modules and vehicles

data.name: MESSAGE_SIX_SENSE_PERK_TEXT
data.value: A very important perk that allows the Commander to determine whether the vehicle has been spotted

data.name: MESSAGE_SKILLS_AND_PERKS_TEXT
data.value: The crew improves the vehicle characteristics

data.name: MESSAGE_UNLOCK_MODULE_TEXT
data.value: Now you can purchase and mount it

data.name: QUEST_CONDITION
data.value: Fight in the Random Battle mode in a Tier III vehicle and apply your knowledge to battling real players

data.name: RESULT_AWARD_CADET_TEXT
data.value: Cause the highest damage in a tutorial battle.

data.name: RESULT_AWARD_CREW_TEXT
data.value: You can now manage your vehicle's crew.

data.name: RESULT_AWARD_DUEL_TEXT
data.value: Destroy at least two enemy vehicles that caused damage to your vehicle in the battle.

data.name: RESULT_AWARD_EXTINGUISHER_TEXT
data.value: Extinguish fires in your vehicle. Can be used multiple times in a battle. The consumable is removed after a battle if it was used at least once.

data.name: RESULT_AWARD_GOLD_TEXT
data.value: You received some valuable in-game currency, which can be used for multiple purposes.

data.name: RESULT_AWARD_INVADER_TEXT
data.value: Participate in a successful capture of a base in a tutorial battle.

data.name: RESULT_AWARD_MEDICALKIT_TEXT
data.value: Treatment of all injured crew members and removing the stun effect. Can be used multiple times in a battle. The consumable is removed after a battle if it was used at least once.

data.name: RESULT_AWARD_PREMIUM_TEXT
data.value: You received days of Premium Account. In addition to extra experience and credits, Premium Account also gets you a nice clean Garage.

data.name: RESULT_AWARD_REPAIRKIT_TEXT
data.value: Repair of all damaged modules. Can be used multiple times in a battle. The consumable is removed after a battle if it was used at least once.

data.name: RESULT_AWARD_SHOOT_TEXT
data.value: Cause more damage to enemy vehicles than the hit points of your vehicle.

data.name: RESULT_AWARD_SNIPER_TEXT
data.value: Fire and hit an enemy vehicle with at least 8 shots in a tutorial battle (non-penetrations and ricochets are counted).

data.name: RESULT_AWARD_TANK_TEXT
data.value: Commander! You won the battle and received a new vehicle as reward. Remember that you can purchase new vehicles as you progress in the game.

data.value: Please wait until a proper server is selected

data.name: loading/tip/modules/header/1
data.value: Hits to External Modules Do Not Reduce Vehicle HP

data.name: message/consumables/text
data.value: Repair damaged modules and treat injured crew members

data.name: message/credits/text
data.value: Used to purchase and upgrade vehicles

data.name: message/equipment/text
data.value: Improves particular characteristics of your vehicle

data.name: message/experience/text
data.value: Used to research modules and vehicles

data.name: message/new/module/text
data.value: The module will be mounted automatically

data.name: message/six/sense/perk/text
data.value: A very important perk that allows the Commander to determine whether the vehicle has been spotted

data.name: message/skills/and/perks/text
data.value: The crew affects the vehicle characteristics

data.name: message/unlock/module/text
data.value: Now you can purchase and mount it

data.name: quest/condition
data.value: Win a battle in the Random Battle mode in a Tier III vehicle. Apply your knowledge in a real battle!

data.name: queue/queue/too/long
data.value: The queue is full. You can wait a bit longer or skip the tutorial.

data.name: result/award/cadet/text
data.value: Cause the highest damage in a tutorial battle.

data.name: result/award/crew/text
data.value: You can now manage your vehicle's crew.

data.name: result/award/duel/text
data.value: Destroy at least 2 enemy vehicles that caused damage to your vehicle in the battle.

data.name: result/award/extinguisher/text
data.value: Extinguishes fire in your vehicle. Can be used multiple times in a battle. The consumable is removed after the battle if it was used at least once.

data.name: result/award/gold/text
data.value: You received some valuable in-game currency, which can be used for multiple purposes.

data.name: result/award/invader/text
data.value: Participate in the successful capture of a base in a tutorial battle.

data.name: result/award/medicalkit/text
data.value: Treats all injured crew members and removes the stun effect. Can be used multiple times in a battle. The consumable is removed after the battle if it was used at least once.

data.name: result/award/premium/text
data.value: Premium Account time has been added to your account. Premium Account lets you earn more credits and experience after each battle, and gives you a nice clean Garage.

data.name: result/award/repairkit/text
data.value: Repairs all damaged modules. Can be used multiple times in a battle. The consumable is removed after the battle if it was used at least once.

data.name: result/award/shoot/text
data.value: Cause more damage to enemy vehicles than the hit points of your vehicle.

data.name: result/award/sniper/text
data.value: Fire and hit an enemy vehicle with at least 8 shots in a tutorial battle (non-penetrations and ricochets are counted).

data.name: result/award/tank/text
data.value: Commander! You won the battle and were awarded a new vehicle in your Garage. Remember that you can purchase new vehicles as you progress in the game.
